name: Xaviersobased
description: '''Xavier Lopez''' (born October 23, 2003), known professionally as '''Xaviersobased''', is an American born Dominican rapper and record producer from [[New York City]]. He is known for his eccentric rapping and production styles. He first gained recognition with his hit song "Patchmade." His songs also span a number of genres, including [[Trap music|trap]], [[Plugg music|plugg]], [[Jerkin'|jerk]], and [[hyperpop]].
